reviews.text: really easy A, you just do a bunch of projects and presentations. almost no homework since she gives you a bunch of class time to do all the work. very nice teacher, take her :)))
Had her last semester for health. We basically had no homework and she was really sweet. You could learn a lot if you wanted but you could also choose to slack off if you wanted.
Get Ms.Seawell if u can. great teacher makes class really fun :D
Health: OMG, she is sooooo funny. Taking her health class was a breeze, and she tells the funniest stories that are way TMI. It was awesome.
pretty easy, won't learn too much in her bio class. collects homework every now and again

She's nice and her class is easy. But she doesn't know the material too well. On quite a few occasions, we asked a question and she told us she'll look it up. The next day, we asked her about it again, and she told us she's was "busy" and never got back to us.

Best teacher I ever had!!! She is super nice and is really great and helpful teacher. She is sorta easy as I received an "A" in her class last semester. I absolutely love her class and I surly garantee that anyone taking her class would agree w/me. she also has a super cute baby. =)
extremely boring and doesn't really teach, we do the same thing everyday in class.

she is the nicest teacher that Lowell has to offer. She does not give much homework and her test are extremely easy. you actually have fun while learning. The ONLY way you can get a B is if you cut class.

had her for bio, nice and easy. but u have to self teach yourself alot. take her 2nd semester since the stuff you learn is easier than the 1st semester. but either one is fun. really easy b/a. :D little hw
MS. Seawell is so fun. her class is funny and fun bcuz she likes to joke around with everyone too! i really loved health class with her. =]

100% by the book. Pop quizzes only if you get too loud in her class. She's really chill, and you can get away with a lot of things in her class. I think the only thing she actually grades are the tests. Otherwise, she would look at your worksheest/outlines and see if you did them or not. She also po
she's nice but her class is kinda boring.
EASY. Honestly, i thin she's great but sometimes i wanted to transfer out so badly. I missed learning in wenning's class.
She doesn't do anything. You basically have to look at the book yourself. I learned more in other classes than hers.

At first, she did quite a few labs. No lab reports. Assessments and outlines for homework. Pop quizzes if you talk too much. Annoyed with repeating herself. Animations on some concepts to help comprehend visually. Tests on each chapter. Fast grader. Extra credit opportunities. Test retakes below C.

she is a little too easy. I just do geometry homework the whole time. you can get b's and c's on tests and still get A's for the semester. She is really nice but does not teach you ANYTHING. If you want an A take her. If you want to learn take Wenning

easy class overall. boring, didnt learn much. she teaches from the book. very often goes off-topic on random stuff. tests can be pretty hard, but she sometimes curves. watch out for those pop quizzes, but they're usually not worth much points
What a fabulous teacher! She lets you have a say without belittling anyone, and is still able to educate thoroughly.
super chill teacher. had her for bio and health (though she doesn't teach bio anymore) shes really nice although you dont learn all that much. very easy A
shes nice i guess, but not that easy
Really great teacher, she lets the class have fun while we still learn. Highly recommend.

I have her for freshman bio and STRONGLY DONT recomend her. By far the worst teacher I have my first semester at lowell. Her class is 100% by the textbook, and we have only done two labs in 4 weeks. She's on her laptop for the first 15 minutes of class. Doesn't help you.I'm a good student,have a D.
She's easy, but don't take her if you actually want to learn. Sometimes, you have to self teach. She's unclear and spends half the semester on movies.
Easy but extremely horrible at teacher. She gives you pop quizzes if you're too loud and she goes by the book all the time. Don't take her if you want to learn.
She's one of the best teachers I have ever had. Hella chill and laidback. Good luck getting her at Arena
She is a kind person and is always there to listen. It may get kind of boring, since it is health, but she is an easy teacher.

I had her for freshman year second semester bio, and health class in the summer. Needless to say, she is a great teacher. You do learn a lot in her classes, and anything you don't know, she will explain it if you ask. She DOES understand what she teaches, and DOES teach it. She's just been a little
She gives lots of homework in the begining !

She is the nicest teacher you will ever meet. She is so easy going. And she makes health a fun class to go to. Sometimes she doesn't know what to say, so she bluntly says it, and it's hilarious. She's always happy and friendly, and you can't help but love her as a teacher :) I loved her health class! The final was super easy too.
Don't even need to pay attention in her class, for the reason that she teaches directly from the book. Yet if you have a clarifying question, she has an answer. She is knowledgeable, just a bit lazy.
